interactiveCard.desc: This card form allows you to see your data reflected in real time on both sides of the card. Tools and libraries used: React Hook Form, Yup, Scss, lodash, classnames, eslint airbnb

moviePop.desc: Movie Catalogue made as part of a job opportunity, using the TVmaze API, back and front end were realiced by me.

atlas.desc: Movie Catalogue made for a job opportunity, this time just front end was made,with the themoviedb API
